snippet.title: LarryDS Chapter 1 - F3 2022 Trailer
snippet.description:
Essentially a more finished version of the SM64DS Hack Direct trailer, though still less than planned since I had to work within a length limit, 1:30 being the maximum length in which a trailer is most likely to get in. The LarryDS Chapter 1 trailer that aired on F3 2022. Here's the link: https://youtu.be/LAkwRaXHpeo?t=2579

Plot Summary:
Soon after being kicked out of his older brother's laboratory, Larry Koopa, a troubled 13-year-old boy, goes to play outside, only to eventually get bored and be met by a voice, who asks him to find the five sacred keys to free his friends, the Starborn Quintuplets, so that they can enact an inter-universal force called "Comet-Side" stated to be the act of proving Larry is awesome. Larry, liking the idea, and having nothing better to do, agrees to help the voice collect the five sacred keys to free the Starborn Quintuplets so he can collect all 79 Power Comets and enact Comet-Side. Along the way, Larry goes through all kinds of crazy and unique situations he wouldn't go through on any normal day across multiple different chapters.

Considering the rules of F3, I'll have to hope that I can finish Chapter 1 by July 2023, that's the plan anyway, it's really close to done other than things that are monotonous to put together, but worth it in the end.
